about.main_text: The perfect balance of design and technology

principle1.title: Focus on UX/UI (Figma)
principle1.text: Design is an investment. We start with a deep understanding of your user to create an interface in Figma that is not just beautiful, but highly convertible. Every element serves a purpose.

principle2.title: Focus on Technology (Next.js/React)
principle2.text: Speed is the standard. Our choice of Next.js and React guarantees your site will be lightning-fast, SEO-friendly, and ready for any scaling. We write clean, documented code.

principle3.title: Transparency and Full Cycle Launch
principle3.text: Transparency and results. We take responsibility for the entire cycle: from analysis, prototyping, development, and testing to final deployment and support. You always know the status of your project.

items.name: Landing Page
